findings.70_99_percent: 17% ARR at 2 years, NNT=6, clear benefit
findings.50_69_percent: Moderate benefit, especially in men, recent symptoms

findings.modern_context: Benefit may be less with optimal medical therapy

clinical_pearls: Symptomatic + ≥70% = clear benefit, NNT=6 over 2 years

Asymptomatic intervention only beneficial if periop risk <3%
50-69% symptomatic: benefit real but smaller - patient selection matters
